name: .PPD File Extension
summary: Learn about .PPD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File that serves as a driver for a PostScript printer; describes the font, paper sizes, DPI resolution, memory configuration, and other features and capabilities supported by the printer.

content: PPD files may also contain PostScript code that can be referenced during a print job. This code includes commands that invoke specific PostScript printing features.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
